%%{init: {'theme': 'neutral'}}%% flowchart TB TOP[apb_rtc
Top Level] TOP --> APB[apb_slave] TOP --> CFG[rtc_config_regs
Register Wrapper] CFG --> REGS["rtc_regs
(PeakRDL)"] TOP --> CORE[rtc_core] CORE --> TIME["Time Counter
(seconds to century)"] CORE --> ALARM["Alarm Comparator"] CORE --> INT_GEN["Interrupt Generator"] CORE --> BCD["BCD Logic"]
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
